attributes.action: force Seldom to do a full week's work
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In the last 12 months she has been off work for the following reasons, her boiler was broken, her boiler needed fixing, her boiler ran off with the budgie next door, her boiler was abducted by aliens, her boiler fell over and killed her gran, her boiler got married, her boiler forgot to do its homework, her boiler was in Big Brother, her boiler blew up, her boiler was on Celebrity Boilers, her boiler was having photo's taken for OK magazine, her boiler was interviewed by the police over Cash for Honours, her boiler was on the latest space shuttle mission & her boiler was working and Seldom was so shocked she collapsed and was rushed to hospital

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
